title: Kyoto French-Inspired Boutique City Stay with Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience the allure of Japan’s cultural capital with a stay at this boutique hotel, which seamlessly blends bold Parisian design with Kyoto’s modern art movements. Centrally located alongside the Kamo River, the hotel is just a stone’s throw from ancient temples, the historic Gion district and the bustling Nishiki Market.

The hotel’s dining scene takes centre stage, with Grand Café FAUCHON offering casual French cuisine alongside views of the Higashiyama Mountain Range, while Salon de Thé FAUCHON blends the ambience of a Parisian-style afternoon tea with a Japanese tea ceremony.

For cocktails with a view, head to Le Bar FAUCHON, or take some time to unwind with a signature treatment at Le Spa FAUCHON. Outside the hotel’s doors, explore the traditional wooden houses of the neighbourhood, experience a maiko or geiko show in an authentic teahouse and savour the flavours of Kyoto’s rich gastronomy.

title: Contemporary Kyoto Escape with Rooftop Bar
description:
Discover Japan's spiritual heart with a stay at Kyoto Tokyu Hotel, a modern and innovative hotel in the heart of traditional Kyoto stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award. Sip Moët in the Rooftop Bar overlooking the city, watch chefs prepare your meal before your eyes at open-plan restaurant KAZAHANA, and relax with a cup of tea at the Horikawa tea lounge and bar. There are another three exquisite onsite dining venues to choose from during your stay, so you're never too far from your next great meal.

When you're not enjoying the gourmet delights offered at the stylish Kyoto Tokyu Hotel, set out and explore the wonders of Kyoto. There are over 2,000 temples and shrines across the city, plus an abundance of Zen gardens, Michelin-starred restaurants, chic cocktail bars, izakaya (Japanese pub-eateries), and artisan shopping. You may also glimpse of an elegant geiko (geisha) or maiko (apprentice geisha) strolling the streets of the old town during your time here.

title: Five-Star Boutique Japan Stay with Onsite Fauchon Patisserie & Sweeping Views of Kyoto
description:
Succumb to the allure of Kyoto's vibrant culture, where Parisian style meets Japanese tradition at Fauchon Hotel Kyoto. Incorporating Japanese flavour with iconic French dishes makes this five-star boutique hotel shine. A haven of tradition, art and culture in downtown Kyoto, explore the ancient temples of Higashiyama, the enchanting bamboo groves of Arashiyama and the bustling Nishiki Market.

Each space within the hotel is a declaration of French art de vivre and Japanese omotenashi hospitality. Indulge in delectable desserts at Salon De Thé FAUCHON, relax at the luxurious spa, or savour innovative Japanese cuisine with a French flair at The Grand Cafe FAUCHON, offering rare panoramic views of Higashiyama.

title: Kyoto Serene Urban Stay near UNESCO World Heritage-listed Nijo Castle Site
description: Near the majestic Nijo Castle UNESCO heritage site, ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto, an IHG Hotel, is a tranquil urban escape with stunning views of greenery and seasonal beauty. Take a calming walk through the Nijo Castle grounds while admiring verdant gardens and imposing stone walls. Dine at the multiple onsite restaurants, offering gastronomic greatness. As the day ends, retire to a tranquil guest room that combines refined minimalism with modern comfort for a sound slumber.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Kyoto, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Horikawa-Dori, Nijojo-Mae, Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto 604-0055, Japan

title: Five-Star Kyoto Glamour with Sensory Spa, All-Day Restaurant & Cocktail Bar
description: Experience Japan's ancient capital with a five-star stay in the heart of Kyoto. Just moments from the historic Gion district and the Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Japan's first instalment of the iconic Six Senses brand is the perfect base for exploring Kyoto's rich cultural heritage. Savour the flavours of traditional Japanese cuisine at the hotel's gourmet Sekki restaurant, rejuvenate with a traditional tea ceremony in the lush garden, or discover sensory therapies at the world-class spa.
offer_address: 431 Myohoin Maekawacho, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto, 605-0932, Japan

title: Tranquil Mercure Kyoto Escape near Amanohashidate with Onsen Lounge
description:
Embrace pure bliss and discover the ancient beauty of northern Kyoto with a sophisticated stay at this Mercure sanctuary, tucked away in idyllic Miyazu. Set along the shimmering shores of Miyazu Bay, the resort is mere moments from the stunning Amanohashidate Kasamatsu Park - regarded as one of Japan's best viewpoints.

Spend your days taking a dip in the seafront, seasonal pool, and relax with traditional onsen experiences, including the hotel's open-air hot spring rock bath. When hunger strikes, savour the local flavours of Kyoto at the onsite restaurant. Venture out to explore the picturesque Wakasa Bay coastline, visit nearby ancient shrines and for something different, make a stop at the unique Red Brick Museum.
offer_address: 58 Koaza Iwamoto, Aza Tai, Miyazu shi, Kyoto, 626-0068, Japan

title: Elegant Japanese Escape with Onsite Tearoom & Fine Dining Restaurant
description: Step into Japan's ancient and wonderous former capital with a stay at the The Hotel Higashiyama by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel. Bursting with historical sites, healing hot springs and pristine Japanese gardens, Kyoto is the ultimate escape for lovers of all things timeless and beautiful. The hotel is equally rejuvenating, with a spa for deep relaxation, the Sarei tearoom where you can indulge in a tea-tasting set and sip the finest matcha, and Nananoichi restaurant for the perfect French-Japanese fusion dining.
location_description: The Hotel Higashiyama by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel
offer_address: 175-2, 3 Chome Ebisucho, Sanjodori Shirakawabashiiru, Higashiyamaku, Kyoto, Japan

title: Modern Kyoto Stay Near Railway Station with Italian Restaurant & Bar
description:
Discover the ancient charm of Kyoto with a stay at this beautifully designed hotel, conveniently located just minutes from Kyoto Railway Station. This modern retreat is the perfect base to explore the city's countless temples, shrines and teahouses. After a day of exploration, savour the authentic flavours of Italy with a uniquely Japanese twist at onsite Trattoria M Kyoto. 

Take advantage of Mercure Kyoto Station's central location and immerse yourself in the city's rich culture with a visit to Kyoto National Museum, Fushimi Inari Shrine or Nishiki Market. When it's time to rest, your elegantly appointed room awaits, offering all the modern comforts you might need for a relaxing stay.
